Package com.skloch.game

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
com.skloch.game.GameLogic
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameLogicInterface
public class GameLogic extends Object implements GameLogicInterface
A class that handles the game logic, including the player, time, energy, and map switching. This class is called by the GameScreen class to update the game.
